body_html:
Thanks - this would work. I guess for a cleaner API, I was imagining something like this:

data = Dataset.from_tensor_slices((initial_features, initial_labels))

# get some new data and append this to the dataset
data.add_from_tensor_slices((new_features, new_labels))
body_text:
Thanks - this would work. I guess for a cleaner API, I was imagining something like this:
data = Dataset.from_tensor_slices((initial_features, initial_labels))

# get some new data and append this to the dataset
data.add_from_tensor_slices((new_features, new_labels))
body:
Thanks - this would work. I guess for a cleaner API, I was imagining something like this:
```python
data = Dataset.from_tensor_slices((initial_features, initial_labels))

# get some new data and append this to the dataset
data.add_from_tensor_slices((new_features, new_labels))
```
